perturbation.original_text:
The following General Terms and Conditions are intended for (i) Web site
owners (hereafter, "Affiliates") who wish to participate as Affiliates in
the Affiliate Program provided by element 5 (governed by II. and IV. in
these General Terms and Conditions) on the basis of these General Terms and
Conditions and also for (ii) Software Publishers who distribute their
software products as downloads using the services of element 5 GmbH,
Vogelsanger Strasse 78, 50823 Cologne, Germany and its subsidiaries
(together hereafter, "element 5") and who wish to make use of the
additional service provided by element 5 (hereafter, "Affiliate
Management", governed under III. and IV. in these General Terms and
Conditions) for integration of the Affiliate Program provided by element 5.
perturbation.changed_text:
The following General Terms and Conditions are intended for (i) Web site
owners (hereafter, "Partners") who wish to participate as Affiliates in
the Affiliate Program provided by element 5 (governed by II. and IV. in
these General Terms and Conditions) on the basis of these General Terms and
Conditions and also for (ii) Software Publishers who distribute their
software products as downloads using the services of element 5 GmbH,
Vogelsanger Strasse 78, 50823 Cologne, Germany and its subsidiaries
(together hereafter, "element 5") and who wish to make use of the
additional service provided by element 5 (hereafter, "Affiliate
Management", governed under III. and IV. in these General Terms and
Conditions) for integration of the Affiliate Program provided by element 5.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Affiliates" to "Partners" creates confusion as the contract primarily refers to 'Affiliates', and it's unclear if 'Partners' is a subset, superset, or entirely separate entity.

perturbation.original_text:
The object of the Affiliate Program provided by element 5 (hereafter,
"Program") is to publish electronic advertisements on the Web site of the
Affiliate for selected software products offered by element 5 Software
Publishers. Instead of fixed compensation, the Affiliate receives result-
dependent Advertising Cost Compensation (also known in the element 5
Control Panel as "Commission") in exchange for publishing the
advertisements. The Advertising Cost Compensation depends on the actual
sales generated by end users referred via the electronic advertisement (the
Affiliate's link).
perturbation.changed_text:
The object of the Affiliate Program provided by element 5 (hereafter,
"Initiative") is to publish electronic advertisements on the Web site of the
Affiliate for selected software products offered by element 5 Software
Publishers. Instead of fixed compensation, the Affiliate receives result-
dependent Advertising Cost Compensation (also known in the element 5
Control Panel as "Bonus") in exchange for publishing the
advertisements. The Advertising Cost Compensation depends on the actual
sales generated by end users referred via the electronic advertisement (the
Affiliate's link).
perturbation.explanation: Changing “Program” to “Initiative” and “Commission” to “Bonus” introduces new terms without defining their relationship with the original terms. It creates ambiguity about the scope and specifics of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
The Affiliate shall integrate the product under the agreement using the
appropriate link on its Web site; the link points to the order form
operated by element 5. This link is generated by a Link Generator for the
respective product under the agreement. The Link
Source: SOUTHERN STAR ENERGY INC., SB-2/A, 12/2/2005

Generator is located in the secure area of element 5's Web site in the
"Affiliate Control Panel". The link that is generated contains an
individualized affiliate user ID by means of which any sales can be
attributed to the Affiliate. Proper technical integration of the link is
the responsibility of the Affiliate. If the links do not function, no
Advertising Cost Compensation will be paid.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Member shall integrate the product under the agreement using the
appropriate link on its Web site; the link points to the order form
operated by element 5. This link is generated by a Link Creator for the
respective product under the agreement. The Link
Source: SOUTHERN STAR ENERGY INC., SB-2/A, 12/2/2005

Creator is located in the secure area of element 5's Web site in the
"Affiliate Control Panel". The link that is generated contains an
individualized affiliate user ID by means of which any sales can be
attributed to the Affiliate. Proper technical integration of the link is
the responsibility of the Affiliate. If the links do not function, no
Advertising Cost Compensation will be paid.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Affiliate" to "Member" and "Link Generator" to "Link Creator" introduces different terms for the same concept, leading to uncertainty about whether "Member" and "Affiliate" are the same and whether "Link Generator" and "Link Creator" are same or different tools with potentially different functionalities.
